author: Tom Crawford
text: Does anyone have some best practices, policies, or standards that help define the internal IT role/responsibilities when a software solution is hosted?  Specifically, we're interested in what the internal IT versus operating side is responsible for (e.g. who has super user, who manages permissions, who should be primary interface with vendor, etc.)
title: Hosted Services - Best Practices
